channel.title: Im brand new and need help
channel.description: ok my buddy gave me a copy of a server, i would like to know a VERY good source, no-ip or what etc etc, how to make the server run, Thanks

item.title: Im brand new and need help
item.dc:creator: @SONG SONG
item.description:
@SONG wrote:

ok im downloading pimpscape as i send this message, but can i just add my server under there, or what do i have to do to just get it running? Thanks SONG[br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2007, 07:01:55 PM[/size][hr]i know NOTHING ABOUT servers, i need a full helpful hand THANKS SONG

Read full topic
item.source: Im brand new and need help

item.title: Im brand new and need help
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

ok use the compiler when it opens up type r then enter and bam your running your server
secondly

a good scource is pimpscape, phonescape, p16 etc, under server downloads you will see in a sticky a list of the server downloads, and download one of the more popular ones.

as far as no.ip, go here http://www.no-ip.com/ go to downloads and download the duc which is here http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php?page=win thats for windows hti download, then signup with no-ip and wait for confirmation email. once you did that sign in and on the right hand side you will see add… hit add and rest is self explanatory… ill post a tutorial later

Read full topic
